feedTitle: Pluralistic: Daily links from Cory Doctorow
summary: Today's links A year in illustration (2024): Call me immodest, but I really think I've upped my game.  Hey look at this: Delights to delectate.  This day in history: 2009, 2014, 2009, 2023 Upcoming appearances: Where to find me...
title: Pluralistic: A year in illustration (2024) (07 Dec 2024)
